com.azure.data.cosmos.internal.changefeed

Interface LeaseManager

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LeaseStoreManager

    public interface LeaseManager
    It defines a way to perform operations with Lease.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Lease> acquire(Lease lease)
      Acquires ownership of the lease.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Lease> createLeaseIfNotExist(String leaseToken, String continuationToken)
      Checks whether the lease exists and creates it if it does not exist.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> delete(Lease lease)
      Deletes the lease.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> release(Lease lease)
      It releases ownership of the lease.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Lease> renew(Lease lease)
      Renew the lease; leases are periodically renewed to prevent expiration.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Lease> updateProperties(Lease leaseToUpdatePropertiesFrom)
      REPLACE item from the specified lease.

    • Method Detail

      • createLeaseIfNotExist

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Lease> createLeaseIfNotExist(String leaseToken,
                                                         String continuationToken)
        Checks whether the lease exists and creates it if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        leaseToken - the lease token to work with.
        continuationToken - the continuation token if it exists.
        Returns:
        the lease.

      • delete

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> delete(Lease lease)
        Deletes the lease.
        Parameters:
        lease - the lease to delete.
        Returns:
        a deferred computation of this call.

      • acquire

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Lease> acquire(Lease lease)
        Acquires ownership of the lease. It can throw LeaseLostException if other host acquired concurrently the lease.
        Parameters:
        lease - the lease to acquire.
        Returns:
        the updated lease.

      • release

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> release(Lease lease)
        It releases ownership of the lease. It can throw LeaseLostException if other host acquired the lease.
        Parameters:
        lease - the lease to acquire.
        Returns:
        a deferred computation of this call.

      • renew

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Lease> renew(Lease lease)
        Renew the lease; leases are periodically renewed to prevent expiration. It can throw LeaseLostException if other host acquired the lease.
        Parameters:
        lease - the lease to renew.
        Returns:
        the updated lease.

      • updateProperties

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Lease> updateProperties(Lease leaseToUpdatePropertiesFrom)
        REPLACE item from the specified lease. It can throw LeaseLostException if other host acquired the lease.
        Parameters:
        leaseToUpdatePropertiesFrom - the new item.
        Returns:
        updated lease.
